protocol_name: Defining critical illness – a scoping review and thematic content analysis: Protocol for a scoping review.
protocol_name_html: Defining critical illness – a scoping review and thematic content analysis: Protocol for a scoping review.

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"25h9d","text":"A protocol will be registered with protocols.io. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"00114460C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","id":667357,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Protocol and registration"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vlv","text":"The inclusion criteria are:All documents and articles identified by the search that discuss critical illness, are written in English, are published since 2008, and involve only human subjects, will be included. We used this priori defined set of reasons for exclusion: Peer reviewed publications that do not have an abstract or full text available online, discusses specific diseases\/ just one aspect of critically ill patients and do not discuss the definition will be excluded.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"1EF1A000C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","id":667358,"previous_guid":"00114460C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","section":"Eligibility criteria"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6tgr","text":"Due to this article being a scoping review, a broad literature search is required. Both published and grey literature will be searched. Rayyan, an online citation management software, will be used during the literature selection to remove duplicates and keep track of articles. The databases PubMed and Web of Science will be searched. Publication lists from European Society of Intensive Care Medicine (ESICM), Society of Critical Care Medicine (SCCM), World Federation of Societies of Intensive and Critical Care Medicine, Svensk F\u00f6rening f\u00f6r Anestesi och Intensivv\u00e5rd (SFAI), The Scandinavian Society of Anesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine (SSAI) and Association of Anaesthetists of Great Britain and Ireland (AAGBI) will be hand searched.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"47055460C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","id":667359,"previous_guid":"1EF1A000C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","section":"Information sources"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fsu7o","text":"The full electronical search strategy for PubMed used: ((((Emergency OR (critical* OR acute* OR sever*) AND (ill OR illness))) AND (terminolog* OR etymolog* OR nomenclatur* OR definition*))) limitations used: Last 10 years and English.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":55,"length":135,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9snri","text":"Web of Science: ((((Emergency OR (critical* OR acute* OR sever*) NEAR\/3 (ill OR illness))) AND (terminolog* OR etymolog* OR nomenclatur* OR definition*))) limitations used: Last 10 years and English. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":16,"length":139,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"198k8","text":"The search strategy has been designed with consultation of the Karolinska Insitutet University Library.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"7DD046D0C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","id":667360,"previous_guid":"47055460C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","section":"Search strategy"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bs282","text":"There will be two reviewers who independently perform all stages of the selection process. All publications will be examined through title and abstract review and full text review. Potential disagreements in the title and abstract screening stage will be solved by including the study in the next stage of screening. Disagreements in the full text reviewing stage will be solved by discussing with a third senior reviewer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"8DDB2E00C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","id":667361,"previous_guid":"7DD046D0C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","section":"Selection of sources of evidence"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"72q66","text":"All data from the publications included in the final selection will be charted using the Microsoft Excel charting form.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"A9B5EAC0C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","id":667362,"previous_guid":"8DDB2E00C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","section":"Data charting process"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8f13k","text":"With the included sources, one or several definitions of critical illness will be extracted.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"B727B080C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","id":667363,"previous_guid":"A9B5EAC0C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","section":"Data items"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6q7uu","text":"The data will be summarized using thematic content analysis, meaning it is both a qualifying and quantifying methodology mixing exploratory work on the unknown phenomenon and analyzing narrative materials of life stories (7). Once a preliminary condensed definition of critical illness has been devised, interviews with experts in the field will be conducted. The interviews will be used to present the findings and further compare the literature and their credibility to increase validation of the data.The criteria for being included as an expert are: Must have at least 10 years of experience clinically or have a PhD in the subject critical illness, must be representatives from different health professions. A purposive sample of at least five experts will be consulted. To decrease the possibility of bias in the interview consultation, a balance between possible supporters and critics will be maintained.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"BACBB240C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","id":667364,"previous_guid":"B727B080C06D11E8ABD95B0D995A36EB","section":"Synthesis of results"}
